tool_description: Creates and maps storage bin locations within warehouse zones with precise coordinate positioning and dimensional specifications.

zone_id.description: Zone identifier where the bin will be located

x_coordinate.description: X-axis position in meters from warehouse origin point

y_coordinate.description: Y-axis position in meters from warehouse origin point

error_messages: Invalid zone_id: Zone must exist before creating bins within it.
Duplicate bin_code: Bin code already exists. Use a unique identifier.
Invalid coordinates: x_coordinate and y_coordinate must be non-negative numbers within warehouse boundaries.
Invalid dimensions: length_cm, width_cm, height_cm must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Invalid z_level: Must be a positive integer representing shelf level.
Invalid weight_limit_kg: Must be a positive number if specified.
usage: Provide zone_id, bin_code, coordinates (x, y, z), dimensions (length, width, height), and optionally weight_limit_kg to create a new storage bin location.

bin_id.description: Generated unique identifier for the bin location

full_address.description: Complete bin address including zone and coordinates
